段: 聽別人講起的愛情攏是糖甘蜜語，若想著阮的過去，心內小雨又綿綿。用心經營彼段感情，一旦做了決定，毋通回頭，毋免傷心。

thiann pat8-lang5 kong2-khi2 in e5 ai3-cheng5 long2 si7 thng5 kam bit8-gi2, na7 siunn7 tioh8 goan2 e5 koe3-khi3, sim-lai7 sio2 hou7 iu7 mi5-mi5. iong7-sim keng-eng5 hit toann7 kam2-cheng5, it-tan3 cho3 liau2 koat-teng7, m7 thang hoe5-thau5, m7 bian2 siong-sim.
收藏紛亂的心情，囥踮時間的皮箱，愛情毋是人的一生，只是成長的過程。起起落落世俗人情，真真假假，分嘛分未清。

siu-chong5 hun-loan7 e5 sim-cheng5, khng3 tiam3 si5-kan e5 phe5-siunn, ai3-cheng5 m7 si7 lang5 e5 it-seng, chi2-si7 seng5-tiong2 e5 koe3-theng5. khi2-khi2-loh8-loh8 se3-siok8 jin5-cheng5, chin-chin-ke2-ke2, hun ma7 hun be7 chheng.
愛著一个人，交換一粒心，毋是一粒燒一粒冷。感情是雙方面互相來體認，那通是吵吵鬧鬧目屎流未停。感謝彼个人結束這段情，從今後毋免為伊傷神，快樂無快樂，幸福未幸福，橫直愛行家己的路。

ai3 tioh8 chit8 e5 lang5, kau-oann7 chit8 liap8 sim, m7 si7 chit8 liap8 sio chit8 liap8 leng2. kam2-cheng5 si7 siong-hong-bin7 hou7-siong lai5 the2-jin7, na2 thang si7 chha2-chha2-nau7-nau7 bak8-sai2 lau5 be7 theng5. kam2-sia7 hit e5 lang5 kiat-sok chit toann7 cheng5, cheng7 kim-au7 m7 bian2 ui7 i siong sin5, khoai3-lok8 bo5 khoai3-lok8, heng7-hok be7 heng7-hok, hoainn5-tit8 ai3 kiann5 ka-ki7 e5 lou7.
我是你的春風，你的花芳你的美夢，你是我的一切，永遠永遠愛我的人。我有你的付出，你的疼惜你的關懷，你有我的真心，我的真情我的真愛。兩个人的世界，只有兩个人會瞭解，兩个人的心肝裡充滿了愛。兩个人的世界，只有兩个人會瞭解。兩个人來手牽手，不怕環境來阻礙。

goa2 si7 li2 e5 chhun-hong, li2 e5 hoe-phang li2 e5 bi2-bang7, li2 si7 goa2 e5 it-chhe3, eng2-oan2-eng2-oan2 ai3 goa2 e5 lang5. goa2 u7 li2 e5 hu3-chhut, li2 e5 thiann3-sioh li2 e5 koan-hoai5, li2 u7 goa2 e5 chin-sim, goa2 e5 chin-cheng5 goa2 e5 chin-ai3. nng7 e5 lang5 e5 se3-kai3, chi2-u7 nng7 e5 lang5 e7 liau2-kai2, nng7 e5 lang5 e5 sim-koann-nih8 chhiong-moa2 liau2 ai3. nng7 e5 lang5 e5 se3-kai3, chi2-u7 nng7 e5 lang5 e7 liau2-kai2. nng7 e5 lang5 lai5 chhiu2-khan-chhiu2, put phann3 khoan5-keng2 lai5 chou2-gai7.
我是你的春風，你的花芳你的美夢，你是我的一切，永遠永遠愛我的人。我有你的付出，你的疼惜你的關懷，你有我的真心，我的真情我的真愛。兩个人的世界，只有兩个人會瞭解，兩个人的心肝裡充滿了愛。兩个人的世界，只有兩个人會瞭解。兩个人來手牽手，不怕環境來阻礙。

goa2 si7 li2 e5 chhun-hong, li2 e5 hoe-phang li2 e5 bi2-bang7, li2 si7 goa2 e5 it-chhe3, eng2-oan2-eng2-oan2 ai3 goa2 e5 lang5. goa2 u7 li2 e5 hu3-chhut, li2 e5 thiann3-sioh li2 e5 koan-hoai5, li2 u7 goa2 e5 chin-sim, goa2 e5 chin-cheng5 goa2 e5 chin-ai3. nng7 e5 lang5 e5 se3-kai3, chi2-u7 nng7 e5 lang5 e7 liau2-kai2, nng7 e5 lang5 e5 sim-koann-nih8 chhiong-moa2 liau2 ai3. nng7 e5 lang5 e5 se3-kai3, chi2-u7 nng7 e5 lang5 e7 liau2-kai2. nng7 e5 lang5 lai5 chhiu2-khan-chhiu2, put phann3 khoan5-keng2 lai5 chou2-gai7.
兩个人的世界，只有兩个人會瞭解，兩个人的心肝裡充滿了愛。兩个人的世界，只有兩个人會瞭解。兩个人來手牽手，不怕環境來阻礙。

nng7 e5 lang5 e5 se3-kai3, chi2-u7 nng7 e5 lang5 e7 liau2-kai2, nng7 e5 lang5 e5 sim-koann-nih8 chhiong-moa2 liau2 ai3. nng7 e5 lang5 e5 se3-kai3, chi2-u7 nng7 e5 lang5 e7 liau2-kai2. nng7 e5 lang5 lai5 chhiu2-khan-chhiu2, put phann3 khoan5-keng2 lai5 chou2-gai7.
受傷的心已經無閒，無閒聽你閣講分明，就欲離開的行李內，尋無你我的將來。女人的心嘛真堅定，閣再講感覺袂著你的情，這張無留住址的批，代表阮永遠袂後悔，啊！傷心傷心的話，請你囥佇你的心肝底，無論天涯抑是海角，阮永遠欲走予你尋啊！愛情愛情是假，何必聲聲句句欲挽回，若是日頭對西爿出來，阮猶是決定欲走予你尋。

siu7-siong e5 sim i2-keng bo5 eng5, bo5 eng5 thiann li2 koh kong2 hun-beng5, chiu7 beh li7-khui e5 heng5-li2 lai7, chhoe7 bo5 li2 goa2 e5 chiong-lai5. lu2-jin5 e5 sim ma7 chin kian-teng7, koh chai3 kong2 kam2-kak boe7 tioh8 li2 e5 cheng5, chit tiunn bo5 lau5 chu7-chi2 e5 phoe, tai7-piau2 goan2 eng2-oan2 boe7 hio7-hoe2, ah! siong-sim siong-sim e5 oe7, chhiann2 li2 khng3 ti7 li2 e5 sim-koann-te2, bo5-lun7 thian-gai5 iah8 si7 hai2-kak, goan2 eng2-oan2 beh chau2 hou7 li2 chhoe7 ah! ai3-cheng5 ai3-cheng5 si7 ke2, ho5-pit siann-siann-ku3-ku3 beh ban2-hoe5, na7 si7 jit8-thau5 tui3 sai-peng5 chhut--lai5, goan2 iau2 si7 koat-teng7 beh chau2 hou7 li2 chhoe7.
受傷的心已經無閒，無閒聽你閣講分明，就欲離開的行李內，尋無你我的將來。女人的心嘛真堅定，閣再講感覺袂著你的情，這張無留住址的批，代表阮永遠袂後悔，啊！傷心傷心的話，請你囥佇你的心肝底，無論天涯抑是海角，阮永遠欲走予你尋啊！愛情愛情是假，何必聲聲句句欲挽回，若是日頭對西爿出來，阮猶是決定欲走予你尋。

siu7-siong e5 sim i2-keng bo5 eng5, bo5 eng5 thiann li2 koh kong2 hun-beng5, chiu7 beh li7-khui e5 heng5-li2 lai7, chhoe7 bo5 li2 goa2 e5 chiong-lai5. lu2-jin5 e5 sim ma7 chin kian-teng7, koh chai3 kong2 kam2-kak boe7 tioh8 li2 e5 cheng5, chit tiunn bo5 lau5 chu7-chi2 e5 phoe, tai7-piau2 goan2 eng2-oan2 boe7 hio7-hoe2, ah! siong-sim siong-sim e5 oe7, chhiann2 li2 khng3 ti7 li2 e5 sim-koann-te2, bo5-lun7 thian-gai5 iah8 si7 hai2-kak, goan2 eng2-oan2 beh chau2 hou7 li2 chhoe7 ah! ai3-cheng5 ai3-cheng5 si7 ke2, ho5-pit siann-siann-ku3-ku3 beh ban2-hoe5, na7 si7 jit8-thau5 tui3 sai-peng5 chhut--lai5, goan2 iau2 si7 koat-teng7 beh chau2 hou7 li2 chhoe7.
啊！傷心傷心的話，請你囥佇你的心肝底，無論天涯抑是海角，阮永遠欲走予你尋啊！愛情愛情是假，何必聲聲句句欲挽回，若是日頭對西爿出來，阮猶是決定欲走予你尋。

ah! siong-sim siong-sim e5 oe7, chhiann2 li2 khng3 ti7 li2 e5 sim-koann-te2, bo5-lun7 thian-gai5 iah8 si7 hai2-kak, goan2 eng2-oan2 beh chau2 hou7 li2 chhoe7 ah! ai3-cheng5 ai3-cheng5 si7 ke2, ho5-pit siann-siann-ku3-ku3 beh ban2-hoe5, na7 si7 jit8-thau5 tui3 sai-peng5 chhut--lai5, goan2 iau2 si7 koat-teng7 beh chau2 hou7 li2 chhoe7.
淒涼的吉他聲伴奏著哀愁的歌聲，孤單的人影唱出著無奈的心聲，我比別人較認真，我比別人較拍拚，為啥物為啥物比別人較歹命，淒涼的吉他聲愈彈是心愈疼，啊！命運命運的吉他聲。

chhi-liang5 e5 gih-tah-siann phoann7-chau3 tioh8 ai-chhiu5 e5 koa-siann, kou-toann e5 lang5-iann2 chhiunn3 chhut tioh8 bo5-nai7 e5 sim-siann, goa2 pi2 pat8-lang5 khah jin7-chin, goa2 pi2 pat8-lang5 khah phah-piann3, ui7-siann2-mih8 ui7-siann2-mih8 pi2 pat8-lang5 khah phainn2-mia7, chhi-liang5 e5 gih-tah-siann lu2 tan5 si7 sim lu2 thiann3, ah! mia7-un7 mia7-un7 e5 gih-tah-siann.
淒涼的吉他聲伴奏著哀愁的歌聲，孤單的人影唱出著無奈的心聲，我比別人較認真，我比別人較拍拚，為啥物為啥物比別人較歹命，淒涼的吉他聲愈彈是心愈疼，啊！命運命運的吉他聲。

chhi-liang5 e5 gih-tah-siann phoann7-chau3 tioh8 ai-chhiu5 e5 koa-siann, kou-toann e5 lang5-iann2 chhiunn3 chhut tioh8 bo5-nai7 e5 sim-siann, goa2 pi2 pat8-lang5 khah jin7-chin, goa2 pi2 pat8-lang5 khah phah-piann3, ui7-siann2-mih8 ui7-siann2-mih8 pi2 pat8-lang5 khah phainn2-mia7, chhi-liang5 e5 gih-tah-siann lu2 tan5 si7 sim lu2 thiann3, ah! mia7-un7 mia7-un7 e5 gih-tah-siann.
我比別人較認真，我比別人較拍拚，為啥物為啥物比別人較歹命，淒涼的吉他聲愈彈是心愈疼，啊！命運命運的吉他聲。

goa2 pi2 pat8-lang5 khah jin7-chin, goa2 pi2 pat8-lang5 khah phah-piann3, ui7-siann2-mih8 ui7-siann2-mih8 pi2 pat8-lang5 khah phainn2-mia7, chhi-liang5 e5 gih-tah-siann lu2 tan5 si7 sim lu2 thiann3, ah! mia7-un7 mia7-un7 e5 gih-tah-siann.
紅燈阻止阮毋通行這條險路，是我好奇願意食鹹甜酸苦，愛人被愛如秋風秋雨。人的勇敢雖然勝過男子漢，但是離開母親彼日，目屎像落雨。

ang5-teng chou2-chi2 goan2 m7 thang kiann5 chit tiau5 hiam2-lou7, si7 goa2 honn3-ki5 goan7-i3 chiah8 kiam5 tinn soan khou2, ai3 jin5 pi7 ai3 ju5 chhiu-hong chhiu-hou7. lang5 e5 iong2-kam2 sui-jian5 seng3 ke3 lam5-chu2-han3, tan7-si7 li7-khui bo2-chhin hit jit8, bak8-sai2 chhiunn7 loh8-hou7.
青燈指示阮趕緊行這條好路，躊躇毋行才失敗後悔心痛苦，情場失敗是自己錯誤。女人的勇敢雖然勝過男子漢，但是離開心愛的人，目屎像落雨。

chhinn-teng chi2-si7 goan2 koann2-kin2 kiann5 chit tiau5 ho2-lou7, tiu5-tu5 m7 kiann5 chiah sit-pai7 hio7-hoe2 sim thong3-khou2, cheng5-tiunn5 sit-pai7 si7 chu7-ki2 chho3-gou7. lu2-jin5 e5 iong2-kam2 sui-jian5 seng3 ke3 lam5-chu2-han3, tan7-si7 li7-khui sim-ai3 e5 lang5, bak8-sai2 chhiunn7 loh8-hou7.
紅燈青燈無迫阮行這條暗路，總是自己選擇的理想前途，浪漫寂寞的滋味濃厚。女人的勇敢雖然勝過男子漢，但是想起阮的終身，目屎像落雨。

ang5-teng chhinn-teng bo5 pek gun2 kiann5 chit tiau5 am3-lou7, chong2-si7 chu7-ki2 soan2-tek8 e5 li2-siong2 chian5-tou5, long7-ban7 chek8-bok8 e5 chu-bi7 long5-hou7. lu2-jin5 e5 iong2-kam2 sui-jian5 seng3 ke3 lam5-chu2-han3, tan7-si7 siunn7 khi2 goan2 e5 chiong-sin, bak8-sai2 chhiunn7 loh8-hou7.
你來行一步，我來跟一步，你攏徛好好，我煞來跋倒。進也進無步，退也退無路，毋敢斡頭看，毋敢喝艱苦，遙遠路途叫阮欲如何。親像孤帆無倚靠，照常一步閣一步，較苦也著渡，毋通靠人助，人情像紙張張薄。

li2 lai5 kiann5 chit8 pou7, goa2 lai5 toe3 chit8 pou7, li2 long2 khia7 ho2-ho2, goa2 soah lai5 poah8-to2. chin3 ia7 chin3 bo5 pou7, thoe3 ia7 thoe3 bo5 lou7, m7 kann2 oat8-thau5 khoann3, m7 kann2 hoah kan-khou2, iau5-oan2 lou7-tou5 kio3 goan2 beh ju5-ho5. chhin-chhiunn7 kou phang5 bo5 oa2-kho3, chiau3-siong5 chit8 pou7 kok chit8 pou7, khah khou2 ia7 tioh8 tou7, m7 thang kho3 lang5 chou7, jin5-cheng5 chhiunn7 choa2 tiunn-tiunn poh8.
你來行一步，我來跟一步，你攏徛好好，我煞來跋倒。進也進無步，退也退無路，毋敢斡頭看，毋敢喝艱苦，遙遠路途叫阮欲如何。親像孤帆無倚靠，照常一步閣一步，較苦也著渡，毋通靠人助，人情像紙張張薄。

li2 lai5 kiann5 chit8 pou7, goa2 lai5 toe3 chit8 pou7, li2 long2 khia7 ho2-ho2, goa2 soah lai5 poah8-to2. chin3 ia7 chin3 bo5 pou7, thoe3 ia7 thoe3 bo5 lou7, m7 kann2 oat8-thau5 khoann3, m7 kann2 hoah kan-khou2, iau5-oan2 lou7-tou5 kio3 goan2 beh ju5-ho5. chhin-chhiunn7 kou phang5 bo5 oa2-kho3, chiau3-siong5 chit8 pou7 kok chit8 pou7, khah khou2 ia7 tioh8 tou7, m7 thang kho3 lang5 chou7, jin5-cheng5 chhiunn7 choa2 tiunn-tiunn poh8.
遙遠路途叫阮欲如何。親像孤帆無倚靠，照常一步閣一步，較苦也著渡，毋通靠人助，人情像紙張張薄。

iau5-oan2 lou7-tou5 kio3 goan2 beh ju5-ho5. chhin-chhiunn7 kou phang5 bo5 oa2-kho3, chiau3-siong5 chit8 pou7 kok chit8 pou7, khah khou2 ia7 tioh8 tou7, m7 thang kho3 lang5 chou7, jin5-cheng5 chhiunn7 choa2 tiunn-tiunn poh8.
明明有緣變無緣，無緣奈何天，奈何天意偏，偏偏無緣變孽緣，孽緣太可憐，可憐恨綿綿，綿綿情仇相牽連，牽來牽去一條鍊，一條命運的鎖鏈鎖鏈。

beng5-beng5 u7 ian5 pian3 bo5 ian5, bo5 ian5 nai7-ho5-thian, nai7-ho5 thian-i3 phian, phian-phian bo5 ian5 pian3 giat8-ian5, giat8-ian5 thai3 kho2-lian5, kho2-lian5 hun7 mi5-mi5, mi5-mi5 cheng5-siu5 sio khan-lian5, khan lai5 khan khi3 chit8 tiau5 lian7, chit8 tiau5 mia7-un7 e5 so2-lian7 so2-lian7.
明明有緣變無緣，無緣奈何天，奈何天意偏，偏偏無緣變孽緣，孽緣太可憐，可憐恨綿綿，綿綿情仇相牽連，牽來牽去一條鍊，一條命運的鎖鏈鎖鏈。

beng5-beng5 u7 ian5 pian3 bo5 ian5, bo5 ian5 nai7-ho5-thian, nai7-ho5 thian-i3 phian, phian-phian bo5 ian5 pian3 giat8-ian5, giat8-ian5 thai3 kho2-lian5, kho2-lian5 hun7 mi5-mi5, mi5-mi5 cheng5-siu5 sio khan-lian5, khan lai5 khan khi3 chit8 tiau5 lian7, chit8 tiau5 mia7-un7 e5 so2-lian7 so2-lian7.
你來敬阮最後一杯，付出以後傷心是代價，愛到如今你講你是別人的，你予阮的情毋願收回。酒啉偌濟，愛才袂清醒，腳踏雙船，阮替你受罪，你無良心，欺負阮對你癡迷，明知阮一杯，就醉甲無反悔。

li2 lai5 keng3 goan2 choe3-au7 chit8 poe, hu3-chhut i2-au7 siong-sim si7 tai7-ke3, ai3 kau3 ju5-kim li2 kong2 li2 si7 pat8-lang5 e5, li2 hou7 goan2 e5 cheng5 m7 goan7 siu-hoe5. chiu2 lim loa7 che7, ai3 chiah boe7 chheng-chhenn2, kha tah8 siang-chun5, goan2 the3 li2 siu7-choe7, li2 bo5 liong5-sim, khi-hu7 goan2 tui3 li2 chhi-be5, beng5-chai goan2 chit8 poe, chiu7 chui3 kah bo5 hoan2-hoe2.
無情人無情來乾杯，有心人用心來交陪，買醉的人愈啉心愈疼，九分醉十分孤單，無情人無情來乾杯。有心人用心來交陪，買醉的人心事無地藏，心茫茫愛也空空，毋知冷暖。

bo5-cheng5-lang5 bo5 cheng5 lai5 kan-poe, iu2-sim-lang5 iong7-sim lai5 kau-poe5, be2 chui3 e5 lang5 lu2 lim sim lu2 thiann3, kiu2 hun chui3 chap8 hun7 kou-toann, bo5-cheng5-lang5 bo5 cheng5 lai5 kan-poe. iu2-sim-lang5 iong7-sim lai5 kau-poe5, be2 chui3 e5 lang5 sim-su7 bo5 te7 chhang3, sim bang5-bang5 ai3 ia7 khang-khang, m7 chai leng2-loan2.
夜半月娘孤單稀微，踮天邊底閃熾。外表是圓圓，內心是傷悲，啥人體會伊心內。人生失志人生得意，親像浮雲遮月圓，親像十五的暗暝。有時悲有時喜，使人欲怨何從起。千言萬語嘆袂離，肯來陪我三更半暝，只有是月娘你。

ia7-poann3 goeh8-niu5 kou-toann hi-bi5, tiam3 thinn-pinn teh siam2-sih. goa7-piau2 si7 inn5-inn5, lai7-sim si7 siong-pi, siann2-lang5 the2-hoe7 i sim-lai7. jin5-seng sit-chi3 jin5-seng tek-i3, chhin-chhiunn7 phu5-hun5 jia goeh8-inn5, chhin-chhiunn7 chap8-gou7 e5 am3-mi5. u7 si5 pi u7 si5 hi2, su2 lang5 beh oan3 ho5-cheng7 khi2. chhian-gian5-ban7-gi2 than3 boe7 li7, kheng2 lai5 poe5 goa2 sann-kenn poann3-mi5, chi2-u7 si7 goeh8-niu5 li2.
夜半月娘孤單稀微，踮天邊底閃熾。外表是圓圓，內心是傷悲，啥人體會伊心內。人生失志人生得意，親像浮雲遮月圓，親像十五的暗暝。有時悲有時喜，使人欲怨何從起。千言萬語嘆袂離，肯來陪我三更半暝，只有是月娘你。

ia7-poann3 goeh8-niu5 kou-toann hi-bi5, tiam3 thinn-pinn teh siam2-sih. goa7-piau2 si7 inn5-inn5, lai7-sim si7 siong-pi, siann2-lang5 the2-hoe7 i sim-lai7. jin5-seng sit-chi3 jin5-seng tek-i3, chhin-chhiunn7 phu5-hun5 jia goeh8-inn5, chhin-chhiunn7 chap8-gou7 e5 am3-mi5. u7 si5 pi u7 si5 hi2, su2 lang5 beh oan3 ho5-cheng7 khi2. chhian-gian5-ban7-gi2 than3 boe7 li7, kheng2 lai5 poe5 goa2 sann-kenn poann3-mi5, chi2-u7 si7 goeh8-niu5 li2.
人生失志人生得意，親像浮雲遮月圓，親像十五的暗暝。有時悲有時喜，使人欲怨何從起。千言萬語嘆袂離，肯來陪我三更半暝，只有是月娘你。

jin5-seng sit-chi3 jin5-seng tek-i3, chhin-chhiunn7 phu5-hun5 jia goeh8-inn5, chhin-chhiunn7 chap8-gou7 e5 am3-mi5. u7 si5 pi u7 si5 hi2, su2 lang5 beh oan3 ho5-cheng7 khi2. chhian-gian5-ban7-gi2 than3 boe7 li7, kheng2 lai5 poe5 goa2 sann-kenn poann3-mi5, chi2-u7 si7 goeh8-niu5 li2.
失去了一切希望，沉淪佇醉坑，雙雙的婆娑人影，滾滾求啥事？賭酒的酒場裡，心神也拍碎，這次怎好勢？這次怎好勢，啊！無情的人。

sit-khi3 liau2 it-chhe3 hi-bong7, tim5-lun5 ti7 chui3 khinn, sang-sang e5 po5-so lang5-iann2, kun2-kun2 kiu5 siann2-su7? tou2 chiu2 e5 chiu2-tiunn5-nih, sim-sin5 ia7 phah-chhui3, chit chhu3 choann2 ho2-se3? chit chhu3 choann2 ho2-se3, ah! bo5 cheng5 e5 lang5.
紅烏的花衫色裙，輾轉無歇睏，毋知天欲光，妖艷酒女敢是妖精的化身，暗鬱的心內暗鬱的心內，啊！又底振動。
ang5 ou e5 hoe-sann sek-kun5, lian3-tng2 bo5 hioh-khun3, m7 chai thinn beh kng, iau-iam7 chiu2-lu2 kann2 si7 iau-chiann e5 hoa3-sin, am3 ut e5 sim-lai7 am3 ut e5 sim-lai7, ah! iu7 teh tin2-tang7.
月娘也想欲歇睏，消失佇雲裡，倚在窗邊看出去，總是烏陰天，無力醉倒椅頂，半睏半啼哭，流落的目屎流落的目屎，啊！無人知影。

goeh8-niu5 ia7 siunn7 beh hioh-khun3, siau-sit ti7 hun5--nih8, oa2 chai7 thang-pinn khoann3--chhut-khi3, chong2-si7 ou-im-thinn, bo5-lat8 chui3 to2 i2-teng2, poann3 khun3 poann3 thi5-khau3, liu5-loh8 e5 bak8-sai2 liu5-loh8 e5 bak8-sai2, ah! bo5 lang5 chai-iann2.
